svt_axi_ace_random_exclusive_access_virtual_sequence Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_axi_ace_random_exclusive_access_virtual_sequence:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Creates system wide random exclusive access sequence on ACE ports. Scenarios which are covered are as follows:
